text: Shavez Hart (6 September 1992 â€“ 3 September 2022) was a Bahamian track and field sprinter. His 200 metres personal best of 20.23 makes him the fourth fastest Bahamian of all time. On 3 September 2022 Hart was shot dead in North Abaco, Bahamas three days before his 30th birthday. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Bahamian sportspeople Category:Murders by firearm
title: Shavez Hart
